title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 261 - Time Allowance Committees
content:

State Regulations
§ 261.1 - Establishment of time allowance committees
§ 261.2 - Role of time allowance committees
§ 261.3 - Procedure of time allowance committees
§ 261.4 - Time allowance hearing

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 261

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§112, 137, 803

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
